Key.Original: Bravo and Echo are awaiting your green light codes. They will neutralize the remaining garrison.
Key.Chinese: Bravo和Echo正等待你的信號。他們將會負責掃除剩下的敵方守軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: Bravo 和 Echo 正等待你的信号。他们将会负责扫除剩下的敌方守军。

Key.Original: Once clear, call in Close Air Support, Whisky-6.
Key.Chinese: 一旦防空威脅解除，請呼叫"Whisky-6"的密接空中支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦对空威胁解除，请呼叫 Whiskey-6"的近距离空中支援。

Key.Original: Neutralize the anti-air team patrolling the eastern perimeter prior to calling in CAS.
Key.Chinese: 殲滅敵方在基地東邊的防空巡邏隊，以利讓我們能呼叫密接空中支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭敌方在基地东边的防空巡逻队，以便让我们能呼叫近距离空中支援。

Key.Original: Coordinate the attack on the airbase and neutralize hostile forces stationed there.
Key.Chinese: 請協調攻擊行動，並殲滅敵方在空軍基地的守軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请协调攻击行动，并歼灭敌方在空军基地的守军。

Key.Chinese: 斯特拉蒂斯空軍基地的東方
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯特拉蒂斯空军基地以东

Key.Original: We incurred heavy losses in this operation. You've let us down, Sergeant. We're in a desperate position now.
Key.Chinese: 我們在這次行動中損失慘重。中士，你真讓我們失望。我們現在陷入絕望了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在这次行动中损失惨重。中士，你真让我们失望。我们现在陷入绝境了。

Key.Original: Although we've incurred some losses, we've neutralised the OPFOR garrison defending the airbase, and have regrouped our surviving forces in the south.
Key.Chinese: 雖然我們多少有點損失，我們仍然成功殲滅了敵方在空軍基地的守軍，並且能重新集結在南方倖存的部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 虽然多少有点损失，我们仍成功歼灭了敌方在空军基地的守军，并且能重新集结在南方幸存的部队。

Key.Original: Thanks to your effective coordination, we have significantly weakened the enemy presence on Stratis, while maintaining our strength and momentum. Outstanding work, Hawkeye.
Key.Chinese: 感謝你出色的指揮，我們已經大大削弱了敵方在斯特拉蒂斯島上的力量，同時能保持住我們部隊的實力與士氣。幹的好，"鷹眼"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 感谢你出色的指挥，我们已经大大削弱了敌方在斯特拉蒂斯岛上的力量，同时能保持住我们部队的实力与士气。干的好，"鹰眼"。

Key.Original: Wield the power of Arma 3's improved Supports. Neutralize the anti-air defences and coordinate a strike on the enemy airbase.
Key.Chinese: 體驗武裝突襲3改進的支援系統。殲滅敵方防空武力，並負責協調攻擊行動來打擊敵方空軍基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 体验武装突袭3改进的支援系统。歼灭敌方防空武力，并负责协调攻击行动来打击敌方空军基地。

Key.Original: We've drawn out most of the enemy forces from the %3airbase%2 and now have a unique opportunity to neutralize the remaining garrison. However, we're still thin on the ground - unable to effectively clear and secure the area against expected OPFOR counter-attacks.%1%1We have two ground teams in position and ready to storm the base: teams %4Bravo%2 (8-man infantry squad) and %5Echo%2 (armed Hunter + 2-man missile team). You also have a Blackfoot (callsign Whisky-6) and a mortar team with 32 HE rounds at your disposal, both stationed at %6Camp Maxwell%2. It's all we can spare; use them wisely.%1%1Be advised, the base is protected by man-portable AA defences; they'll tear our lightly-armoured gunship to pieces. This is an ideal target for your mortar team. Carefully coordinate your attack to result in minimal friendly casualties. We're still perilously out-manned on Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 我們已經引出了大部分敵軍在%3空軍基地%2的部隊，並且獲得了一個難得的機會好來殲滅剩下的守軍。然而，我們地面部隊的力量仍然過於薄弱-無法有效的清除該區並應付敵方的反擊。%1%1我們有兩支地面部隊已經在定位就緒並準備強攻基地:%4Bravo%2小隊(8名人員組成的步兵班)和%5Echo%2(武裝"獵人"+2名人員組成的飛彈小隊)。你同時擁有"黑足"武裝直升機(呼號為"Whisky-6")和一支迫擊砲小隊(有32發高爆彈藥)供你使用，這兩支部隊都駐紮在%6麥克斯韋營地%2。這些就是我們能調度的全部支援;請明智的使用他們。%1%1請注意，該基地有防空巡邏兵(使用單兵便攜式防空武器)駐守;他們可以輕易撕裂我們武裝直升機脆弱的機殼。他們是你迫擊砲小隊的理想目標。請小心協調攻擊行動，盡量減少友軍傷亡。我們在斯特拉蒂斯島上的人數仍很稀少。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经引出了大部分在%3空军基地%2的敌军部队，现在我们获得了一个难得的机会来歼灭剩下的守军。然而，我们地面部队的力量仍然过于薄弱—无法有效的清除该区并应付敌方的反击。%1%1我们有两支地面部队已经在定位就绪并准备强攻基地：%4Bravo%2组(8名人员组成的步兵班)和%5Echo%2组(武装"猎人"+2名人员组成的导弹小队)。你同时拥有"黑足"武装直升机(呼号为 Whiskey-6")和一个迫击炮射组(有32发高爆弹药)供你使用，这两支部队都驻扎在%6麦克斯韦营地%2。这些就是我们能调度的全部支援;请明智地使用他们。%1%1请注意，该基地有防空巡逻队（使用单兵便携式防空武器）驻守;他们可以轻易撕裂我们武装直升机脆弱的机身。他们是你迫击炮小队的理想目标。请小心协调攻击行动，尽量减少友军伤亡。我们在斯特拉蒂斯岛上的人手非常不足。

Key.Original: %2Hawkeye%1 - Forward observer, you%7%3Bravo%1 - Infantry squad%7%4Echo%1 - Motorized infantry team%7%5Whisky-6%1 - Blackfoot gunship%7%6Papa Bear%1 - HQ
Key.Chinese: %2"鷹眼"%1-前線觀察員，你%7%3Bravo%1-步兵班%7%4Echo%1-摩托化步兵隊%7%5"Whisky-6"%1-"黑足"武裝直升機%7%6Papa Bear%1-總部
Key.Chinesesimp: %2"鹰眼"%1-前进观察员，你%7%3Bravo%1-步兵班%7%4Echo%1-摩托化步兵小组%7%5Whiskey-6"%1-"黑足"武装直升机%7%6Papa Bear%1-总部

Key.Original: Wield the power of Arma 3's improved Supports. Neutralize the anti-air defences and coordinate a strike on the enemy airbase.
Key.Chinese: 體驗武裝突襲3改進的支援系統。殲滅敵方防空武力，並負責協調攻擊行動來打擊敵方空軍基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 体验武装突袭3改进的支援系统。歼灭敌方防空武力，并负责协调攻击行动来打击敌方空军基地。

Key.Original: From an %2overwatch point%1 above the airbase, coordinate a swift combined-arms assault, neutralize hostile forces, and fall back to %3Camp Maxwell%1.
Key.Chinese: 從%2觀測站%1觀察空軍基地，迅速協調聯合攻擊行動，殲滅敵方部隊，然後撤回%3麥克斯韋營地%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 从%2观测站%1观察空军基地，迅速协调联合攻击行动，歼灭敌方部队，然后撤回%3麦克斯韦营地%1。

Key.Original: %6 Get into position on overwatch and evaluate the situation on the %3airbase%2%1%7 If you decide to send in the gunship, first neutralize the %4AA patrol%2. This is an ideal target for your mortar team%1%8 Coordinate the attack: call in our squads via the Supports menu; defeat hostile forces garrisoned at the airbase%1%9 Fall back and regroup at %5Camp Maxwell%2
Key.Chinese: %6到達觀測站並對%3空軍基地%2實施觀察%1%7假如你想呼叫武裝直升機，那就必須先剷除%4防空巡邏兵%2。這對我們的迫擊砲小隊來說是一個理想的目標%1%8協調進攻行動:通過支援選單進行呼叫;殲滅敵方在空軍基地的守軍%1%9撤退回%5麥克斯韋營地%2
Key.Chinesesimp: %6到达观测站并对%3空军基地%2实施观察%1%7假如你想呼叫武装直升机，那就必须先铲除%4防空巡逻兵%2。这对我们的迫击炮小队来说是一个理想的目标%1%8协调进攻行动：通过支援菜单进行呼叫;歼灭敌方在空军基地的守军%1%9撤回%5麦克斯韦营地%2

Key.Original: Say again, Hawkeye, task executed with no mortar support? Over.
Key.Chinese: 請重發，"鷹眼"，確定不需要迫擊砲支援?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请重复，"鹰眼"，确定不需要迫击炮支援？完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that. We appreciate your confidence Sergeant, but be sure to support the assault properly. Mortars are still on standby. Over.
Key.Chinese: 收到。中士，我們感謝你的信心，但請你一定要支援地面突擊小隊。迫擊砲仍隨時待命。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。中士，我们感谢你的自信，但请你一定要支援地面突击小队。迫击炮仍随时待命。完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, Hawkeye, be advised, AA teams neutralised, over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，"鷹眼"，請注意，防空巡邏小隊已殲滅，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，"鹰眼"叫，注意，防空巡逻队已歼灭，完毕。

Key.Original: Affirmative, sir. I saw an opportunity. I took it.
Key.Chinese: 是的，長官。我看到了一絲機會。我把握住了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 是的，长官。我看到了一丝机会。我把握住了。

Container.name: x01_Casaulties
Container.situation: blufor units decimated, hq orders retreat

Key.Original: Hawkeye, what's the situation? We've lost contact with most of the teams, over.
Key.Chinese: "鷹眼"，現在狀況如何?我們已經與絕大部分小隊失去聯繫，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鹰眼"，现在状况如何？我们已经与绝大部分小队失去联系，完毕。

Key.Original: Goddamnit, Sergeant, you had the upper hand here - this was not supposed to happen! Everyone, fall back to Gamma and await evac. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: 天殺的，中士，你應該是要佔上風的-這種情況是不該發生的!所有人，撤退回"伽馬"點並等待撤離。Papa Bear通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 天杀的，中士，你在那里看得一清二楚—不该发生这种情况！所有人，撤退回"伽马"位置并等待撤离。Papa Bear 通话完毕。

Key.Original: It's bad... we're getting our asses handed to us, sir. Please advise, over.
Key.Chinese: 這太糟糕了...我們正在被屠殺，長官。請下達指示，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这太糟糕了...我们正在被屠杀，长官。请下达指示，完毕。

Container.name: 15_Base_clear
Container.situation: player reports mission complete to the hq

Key.Original: Loud and clear, Hawkeye, good job. All teams, sweep the AO for casualties and RTB. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: 非常清楚，"鷹眼"，幹的好。所有小隊，檢查行動區域的傷亡人數並返回基地。Papa Bear通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 非常清楚，"鹰眼"，干的好。所有小组，打扫战场，清点伤亡人数并返回基地。Papa Bear 通话完毕。

Key.Original: Hawkeye to Papa Bear, mission complete. Enemy forces on the airbase neutralized. Do you read? Over.
Key.Chinese: "鷹眼"致Papa Bear，任務成功。敵人守軍已殲滅。是否收到?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "鹰眼"呼叫 Papa Bear，任务完成。空军基地的敌守军已被歼灭。是否收到？完毕。

Container.name: 10_Echo_green_light
Container.participants: PB B Hawkeye;PB B Echo Lead;
Container.situation: player calls in team echo

Key.Original: Wilco, Hawkeye. Echo is rolling. ETA: 2 mikes. Out.
Key.Chinese: 照辦，"鷹眼"。Echo開始向前突擊。預計抵達時間:2分鐘。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"鹰眼"。Echo 开始突击。预计抵达时间：2分钟。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Echo, this is Hawkeye. Commence your assault, over.
Key.Chinese: Echo，這裡是"鷹眼"。開始進行突擊，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo，这里是"鹰眼"。开始进行突击，完毕。

Container.name: 05_Bravo_green_light
Container.participants: PB B Hawkeye;PB B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: player calls in team bravo

Key.Original: Copy that, Bravo on the move, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，Bravo開始移動，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Bravo 开始移动，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Hawkeye to Bravo, proceed with mission, over.
Key.Chinesesimp: "鹰眼"呼叫 Bravo，继续进行任务，完毕。

Container.name: 03_AA_Elimiated
Container.situation: optional sentence if we want?

Key.Original: Acknowledged. Continue with the operation. Out.
Key.Chinese: 確認。繼續你的任務。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认。继续你的任务。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, Hawkeye, be advised, AA teams neutralised, over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，"鷹眼"，請注意，防空巡邏小隊已殲滅，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，"鹰眼"呼叫，请注意，防空巡逻小组已歼灭，完毕。

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: SUPPORTS - Powerful Fire Support, Long-Range Engagement, Improved Scopes
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:支援-強大的火力支援，長距離交戰，改進的望遠鏡
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示：支援—强大的火力支援，长距离交战，改进的望远镜

Container.name: 01_Sitrep
Container.participants: PB B HQ;PB B Hawkeye;PB B Bravo Lead;PB B Echo Lead;
Container.situation: mission start, sitrep from ground teams

Key.Original: Papa Bear to ground forces, SITREP, over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear致地面單位，狀況回報，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear 致地面单位，状况报告，完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that, Hawkeye, CAS and mortar teams are on standby.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"鷹眼"，密接空中支援與迫擊砲小隊皆已就緒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"鹰眼"，近距离空中支援和迫击炮小组都已就绪。

Key.Original: Be advised, ETA on the shells is 40 seconds from request. About the same on the gunship, too. Be sure to factor this in for any moving targets.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，迫擊砲著彈時間預估為40秒。武裝直升機的狀況也一樣。請預先估算好目標的移動路線。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，迫击炮着弹时间预估为40秒。武装直升机的状况也一样。请预先估算好目标的移动路线。

Key.Original: Proceed with the operation. Good luck. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: 開始行動。祝好運。Papa Bear通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 开始行动。祝好运。Papa Bear 通话完毕。

Key.Original: This is Hawkeye - in position above the airbase - eyes on target.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"鷹眼"-已經在基地上方的位置了-看到目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"鹰眼"-已经在基地上方的位置了—看到目标。

Key.Original: Enemy forces are approaching your position. Set up a defense perimeter and repel the attack.
Key.Chinese: 敵人正在接近你的位置。建立防禦並擊退他們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌人正在接近你的位置。建立防御并击退他们。

Key.Original: If you repel the remaining enemy forces, the game ends as a DRAW.
Key.Chinese: 假如你們擊退剩下的敵人，遊戲將結束於平手之中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如你们击退剩下的敌人，游戏将结束于平手之中。

Key.Original: With evacuation helicopter destroyed, your only chance to get to the safety disappeared. You have to hide, but in order to do so, the last enemy attack have to be neutralized.
Key.Chinese: 隨著撤離直升機被摧毀，你們的一線生機也隨之消失。你們必須藏起來，要做到此一效果，你們必須消滅最後一波敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着撤离直升机被摧毁，你们的一线生机也随之消失。你们必须藏起来，要做到此效果，你们必须消灭最后一波敌人。

Key.Original: Your respawns are disabled during the last stand.
Key.Chinese: 重生將在最後一搏中關閉。
Key.Chinesesimp: 重生将在最后一搏中关闭。

Key.Original: If helicopter is shot down, but you survive, the last stand starts.
Key.Chinese: 假如直升機被擊落，但你們倖存下來了，最後一搏將開啟。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如直升机被击落，但你们幸存下来了，最后一搏将开启。

Key.Original: Extraction helicopter arrives after %1 attack wave. If you manage to get in and evacuate, you WIN.
Key.Chinese: 撤離直升機將在%1攻擊後抵達。假如你們成功撐過並撤離了，你們就贏了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离直升机将在%1攻击后抵达。假如你们成功撑过并撤离了，你们就赢了。

Key.Original: If enemy takes control of your camp, you LOSE.
Key.Chinese: 假如敵軍控制了營地，你們就輸了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如敌军控制了营地，你们就输了。

Key.Original: Defend your camp against enemy forces.
Key.Chinese: 防守你們的基地免於敵人的攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 防守你们的基地免于敌人的攻击。

Key.Original: The evacuation helicopter is waiting on the ground, defenseless and exposed - get in ASAP!
Key.Chinese: 撤離直升機已經抵達，他現在沒有任何防禦-趕快進入!
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离直升机已经抵达，它现在没有任何防御—赶快进入！

Key.Original: Enemy units will be spawned only in this area and sent to attack player bases. Areas are unlocked one by one after each wave. The trigger will be activated once the area is active.
Key.Chinese: 敵軍單位將會在此區出生並持續攻擊玩家營地。區域將在每波之間解鎖。觸發器將在區域被觸發後觸發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军单位将会在此区出生并持续攻击玩家营地。区域将在每波之间解锁。触发器将在区域被触发后触发。

Key.Original: Side of attacking forces, recognized by presence of synced curator.
Key.Chinese: 攻擊方，由一個策劃者所控制。
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击方，由一个策划者所控制。

Key.Original: A base players have to defend. When all bases are under enemy side control, players lose.
Key.Chinese: 玩家必須防守陣地。當所有陣地被敵軍控制時，玩家就輸了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩家必须防守阵地。当所有阵地被敌军控制时，玩家就输了。

Key.Original: Landing spot for evacuation helicopter. Valid only for player sides.
Key.Chinese: 撤離直升機著陸點。只對玩家方有效。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离直升机着陆点。只对玩家方有效。

Key.Original: Evacuation helicopter (or just its pilot). Valid only for player sides.
Key.Chinese: 撤離直升機(或他的駕駛)。只對玩家方有效。
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离直升机（或他的飞行员）。只对玩家方有效。

Key.Original: Should the enemy manage to shoot down the helicopter first, players can still repel the last wave and achieve stalemate.
Key.Chinese: 假如敵軍射下撤離直升機，玩家仍可透過撐過最後一波來實現平手。
Key.Chinesesimp: 假如敌军击落撤离直升机，玩家仍可透过撑过最后一波来实现平手。

Key.Original: After few waves, they can call in an evacuate helicopter and leave, leading to their victory
Key.Chinese: 經過幾波後，他們可以呼叫撤離直升機來進行撤離，領導他們邁向勝利
Key.Chinesesimp: 经过几波后，他们可以呼叫撤离直升机来进行撤离，这会导致其胜利

Key.Original: When all player sectors are captured by the enemy side, they lose.
Key.Chinese: 當所有玩家區域被佔領，他們就輸了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 当所有玩家区域被占领，他们就输了。

Key.Original: Players are defending their base sectors against incoming enemy waves.
Key.Chinese: 玩家正在防守他們的區域來抵禦敵人的攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 玩家正在防守他们的区域来抵御敌人的攻击。

Key.Original: Crate Defend mode, compatible both with single- and multiplayer.
Key.Chinese: 創造防守模式，兼容單人遊玩與多人遊玩。
Key.Chinesesimp: 创造防守模式，兼容单人游玩与多人游玩。

Key.Original: A wave ends when only given portion of the whole wave size remains (e.g., 0.3 means wave ends when 30% of enemy wave remains)
Key.Chinese: 每波只會在所有敵人都被消滅後才會結束(例子，0.3意味著還有30%的敵人還沒被消滅)
Key.Chinesesimp: 每波只会在所有敌人都被消灭后才会结束（例子，0.3意味着还有30%的敌人还没被消灭）

Key.Original: How much will system prioritize spawning seacrafts
Key.Chinese: 多少海上載具將由系統優先產生
Key.Chinesesimp: 多少海上载具将由系统优先产生

Key.Original: How much will system prioritize spawning infantry
Key.Chinese: 多少步兵將由系統優先產生
Key.Chinesesimp: 多少步兵将由系统优先产生

Key.Original: How much will system prioritize spawning ground vehicles
Key.Chinese: 多少地面載具將由系統優先產生
Key.Chinesesimp: 多少地面载具将由系统优先产生

Key.Original: How much will system prioritize spawning aircrafts
Key.Chinese: 多少飛行載具將由系統優先產生
Key.Chinesesimp: 多少飞行载具将由系统优先产生

Key.Original: Evacuation helicopter arrived to AO, waiting for your signal. Once called, it will need 5 minutes to reach your location. This is your only chance, make sure the landing area is safe!
Key.Chinese: 撤離直升機已經抵達任務區域，正在等待你們的信號。一旦呼叫，他將在5分鐘之內抵達你們的位置。這是你們唯一的撤離機會，請確保降落區域是安全的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离直升机已经抵达任务区域，正在等待你们的信号。一旦呼叫，它将在5分钟之内抵达你们的位置。这是你们唯一的撤离机会，请确保降落区域是安全的！

Key.Original: Evac heli will be unlocked after this wave
Key.Chinese: 在這波結束之後，可以呼叫撤離直升機
Key.Chinesesimp: 在这波结束之后，可以呼叫撤离直升机

Container.name: 01_BLUFOR
Container.situation: base giving players info about their progress

Key.Original: All units, be advised, enemy forces inbound. Attempting to route evac to your grid. Hold your position! Good luck, out.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，請注意，敵軍部隊正在接近你們的座標中。守住你們的位置!祝好運，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，请注意，敌军部队正在接近你们的座标中。守住你们的位置！祝好运，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Enemy forces neutralized. Regroup and rearm - another attack is imminent.
Key.Chinese: 敵軍部隊已殲滅。重新集結並重新武裝-另一波攻擊快來了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军部队已歼灭。重新集结并重新武装—另一波攻击快来了。

Key.Original: All units, enemy forces neutralized, but you're on your own, gentlemen - cannot route any further evac. Out.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，敵軍部隊已殲滅，但你們只能靠自己，我們已經無法提供任何撤離支援了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，敌军部队已歼灭，但你们只能靠自己，我们已经无法提供任何撤离支援了。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Enemy forces breaching your perimeter. Push them back! Hold your ground!
Key.Chinese: 敵軍部隊正在進犯你們的邊界。把他們打回去!守住你們的位置!
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军部队正在进犯你们的边界。把他们打回去！守住你们的位置！

Key.Original: Dig in! Evac helicopter en route!
Key.Chinese: 撐住!撤離直升機在路上了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 撑住！撤离直升机在路上了！

Key.Original: Outstanding, gentlemen! Be advised, evac helicopter holding 5 mikes from your position; awaiting your signal. Make sure the landing zone is secure.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，先生們!請注意，撤離直升機在距離你們5分鐘路程之內的地方;等待你們的信號。請確保降落區是安全的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，先生们！请注意，撤离直升机在距离你们5分钟路程之内的地方;等待你们的信号。请确保降落区是安全的。

Key.Original: Helo inbound to your location. ETA 5 mikes. Prep for evac.
Key.Chinese: 直升機正接近你們的位置當中。預計5分鐘後抵達。請準備撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机正接近你们的位置当中。预计5分钟后抵达。请准备撤离。

Key.Original: Be advised, evac helicopter en route to extract the other team. ETA 5 mikes.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，撤離直升機正在前往接應其他隊伍當中。預計5分鐘後抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，撤离直升机正在前往接应其他队伍当中。预计5分钟后抵达。

Key.Original: There's only space for one team in the helicopter. Some of you may have to stay behind. I'm sorry guys, out.
Key.Chinese: 直升機的空間僅限一個隊伍能擠的下。你們之中一些人必須被留下來了。我很抱歉，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 直升机的空间仅限一个队伍能挤下。你们之中一些人必须被留下来了。我很抱歉，通话完毕。

Key.Original: All units, helo down! We're unable to provide further evac! Enemy forces regrouping for final assault; hold your ground.
Key.Chinese: 所有單位，直升機已被擊落!我們已經無法提供任何支援了!敵軍部隊正在集結中，為最後一波攻擊做準備;守住你們的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有单位，直升机已被击落！我们已经无法提供任何支援了！敌军部队正在集结中，为最后一波攻击做准备;守住你们的位置。

Key.Original: Outstanding effort out there, gentlemen! RTB!
Key.Chinese: 先生們，你們幹的太棒了!撤回基地!
Key.Chinesesimp: 先生们，你们干的太棒了！撤回基地！

Key.Original: Listen to the Range Officer's instructions and follow him to the Course of Fire.
Key.Chinese: 聽從靶場教練的教學，並跟著他到靶場。
Key.Chinesesimp: 听从靶场教练的教学，并跟着他到靶场。

Key.Original: An introduction to Firing Drills, the rules and target types.
Key.Chinese: 一個關於射擊的課程，交戰規則與目標類型。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个关于射击的课程，交战规则与目标类型。

Key.Original: A more traditional shooting range where the targets are further away and may require correct zeroing.
Key.Chinese: 一個傳統的靶場，目標會在不同距離上，需要進行歸零的動作來擊中目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个传统的靶场，目标会在不同距离上，需要进行归零的动作来击中目标。

Key.Original: A compressed course focusing on leaning and engaging from cover.
Key.Chinese: 一個短距離的靶場，訓練如何從掩體後探身射擊的技巧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个短距离的靶场，训练如何从掩体后探身射击的技巧。

Key.Original: A stretched course which involves some running and sprinting - a mock-up house in the middle trains room clearing.
Key.Chinese: 一個長距離的靶場，其中包括一些奔跑與衝刺的關卡，在訓練中間還有一間房間來訓練肅清的動作。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一个长距离的靶场，其中包括一些奔跑与冲刺的关卡，在训练中间还有一间房间来训练肃清的动作。

Key.Original: Prove your skills: tactical movement and target scanning / acquisition / engagement
Key.Chinese: 展現你的技巧:戰術移動與目標搜尋/尋獲/交戰
Key.Chinesesimp: 展现你的技巧：战术移动与目标搜寻/寻获/交战

Key.Original: You've failed to observe safe weapon discipline.
Key.Chinese: 你沒有遵守武器安全使用規章。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你没有遵守武器安全使用规章。

Key.Original: Firing Drills and Time Trials to hone your skills with weapons and vehicles
Key.Chinese: 射擊訓練與計時賽，可以磨練你使用武器與載具的技巧
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击训练与计时赛，可以磨练你使用武器与载具的技巧

Key.Original: You've been disqualified because of cheating.
Key.Chinese: 你因作弊而被取消資格。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你因作弊而被取消资格。

Container.name: Timing
Container.situation: radio feedback from the range officer to the competitor

Key.Chinese: 讓我們來看看你做得如何
Key.Chinesesimp: 让我们来看看你做得如何

Container.name: Rules
Container.situation: radio feedback from the range officer to the competitor (rules, rule-sets)

Key.Original: Do you understand the Course of Fire?

Container.name: Positive
Container.situation: radio feedback from the range officer to the competitor

Key.Chinese: 你打破你的最佳成績了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你打破你的最佳成绩了！

Container.name: Neutral
Container.situation: radio feedback from the range officer to the competitor

Container.name: Negative
Container.situation: radio feedback from the range officer to the competitor

Key.Chinese: 射到不能射擊的目標，扣分!
Key.Chinesesimp: 射到不能射击的目标，扣分！

Container.name: Misc
Container.situation: radio feedback from the range officer to the competitor

Container.name: COFGreen
Container.situation: radio tutorial instructions from the range officer to the competitor for training. brevity and quick speech are key for timing (especially during the course)!

Key.Original: Here we are! Welcome to our fine sport shooting facility. I'll be your Range Officer for today. It's my job you get you oriented and keep everyone safe.
Key.Chinese: 我們到了!歡迎來到我們精美的靶場。我是你今天的教練。我的工作就是引導你正確的學習射擊並確保大家的安全。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们到了！欢迎来到我们精美的靶场。我是你今天的教练。我的工作就是引导你正确的学习射击并确保大家的安全。

Key.Original: Most courses are composed of Check Points that you'll follow; others allow more 'freestyle' navigation.
Key.Chinese: 大部分的站點你必須遵照檢察點行走;而剩下的就靠你'自由發揮'了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 大部分的站点你必须遵照检察点行走;而剩下的就靠你'自由发挥'了。

Key.Original: Depending on the rules, you'll need to engage all targets before moving on, or, you can skip targets and accept a penalty.
Key.Chinese: 根據規則，你必須在你移動到下一個站點前擊倒目標，或者，你也可以選擇跳過並接受扣分。
Key.Chinesesimp: 根据规则，你必须在你移动到下一个站点前击倒目标，或者，你也可以选择跳过并接受扣分。

Key.Original: For your first firing drill, we'll do a quick run-through the basics.
Key.Chinese: 對於你是第一次射擊練習，讓我們先做一次快速的基礎練習。
Key.Chinesesimp: 对于你是第一次射击练习，让我们先做一次快速的基础练习。

Key.Original: These drills are designed to hone your shooting and movement skills.
Key.Chinese: 此次練習旨在磨練你的射擊與移動技巧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 此次练习旨在磨练你的射击与移动技巧。

Key.Original: As a competitor, you're expected to effectively navigate Courses of Fire and deal with any obstacles.
Key.Chinese: 作為一個競爭者，你可以多多嘗試更有效的射擊方式來面對任何障礙。
Key.Chinesesimp: 作为一个竞争者，你可以多多尝试更有效的射击方式来面对任何障碍。

Key.Original: Along the way, you'll scan for targets, engaging them quickly and accurately.
Key.Chinese: 一路上，你將要搜尋目標，準確地瞄準並快速射擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一路上，你将要搜寻目标，准确地瞄准并快速射击。

Key.Original: The goal is real simple: finish the drill in the best possible time.
Key.Chinese: 你的目標很簡單:盡可能在最佳時間之內完成練習。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的目标很简单：尽可能在最佳时间之内完成练习。

Key.Original: Of course, really, we're just here to compete!
Key.Chinese: 當然啦，我們在這邊就是要競爭!
Key.Chinesesimp: 当然啦，我们在这边就是要竞争！

Key.Original: Ok, now, we're entering the Green Course of Fire.
Key.Chinese: Ok，現在，我們正要進入初級射擊課程。
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，现在，我们正要进入初级射击课程。

Key.Original: Bring up and load your weapon. Make sure to observe strict weapon discipline and get to the start of the course.
Key.Chinese: 拿起你的武器並準備好。在課程開始後請嚴格遵守射擊紀律。
Key.Chinesesimp: 拿起你的武器并准备好。在课程开始后请严格遵守射击纪律。

Key.Original: Ok, time for some targets. We'll start with just one, for now.
Key.Chinese: Ok，該是射目標的時候了。目標將會出現在，現在。
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，该是射目标的时候了。目标将会出现在，现在。

Key.Original: This target appears later and does not stay up. Missing results in penalty time.
Key.Chinese: 此目標會慢點出現並且不會久留。錯失目標將會有懲罰時間。
Key.Chinesesimp: 此目标会慢点出现并且不会久留。错失目标将会有惩罚时间。

Key.Chinese: 目標會在不同時間出現...
Key.Chinesesimp: 目标会在不同时间出现...

Key.Original: ... and multiple targets at once here.
Watch out for the no-shoot targets!
Key.Chinese: 請注意不能射擊的目標!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意不能射击的目标！

Key.Original: Your final time is affected by the penalties you've incurred and the bonuses you've won. Cutting corners isn't always faster!
Key.Chinese: 你的最終成績是由你產生的扣分行為與贏得的加分所產生的。走捷徑不一定會讓你得更高分!
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的最终成绩是由你产生的扣分行为与赢得的加分所产生的。走捷径不一定会让你得更高分！

Key.Original: In the second lane, the concept of using specific weapons is introduced. In this case, use your rifle, but always observe the Check Point briefing.
Key.Chinese: 在第二關，你必須使用指定的武器。在這邊，使用你的步槍，但請隨時注意每一檢查點的簡報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在第二关，你必须使用指定的武器。在这边，使用你的步枪，但请随时注意每一检查点的简报。

Key.Original: Courses sometimes introduce shooting boxes at Check Points. Engaging targets from these boxes nets the best results.
Key.Chinese: 有時一些站點會使用射擊框。從這些框框中的隙縫射擊敵人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有时一些站点会使用射击框。从这些框框中的隙缝射击敌人。

Key.Original: Check Points may also define a specific stance to use - like firing from prone or taking a knee. Be sure to keep an eye on the Check Point briefing when you study and memorize the course.
Key.Chinese: 一些檢查點也會規定特定的射擊姿態-像是趴下或蹲下射擊。一定要留意每個站點的簡報，學習並記憶它們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一些检查点也会规定特定的射击姿态—像是趴下或蹲下射击。一定要留意每个站点的简报，学习并记忆它们。

Key.Original: We'll be switching weapons again for this lane.
Key.Chinese: 在此關我們將再次切換武器。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在此关我们将再次切换武器。

Key.Original: The key to improving your skills is repetition. Train, train and train some more.
Key.Chinese: 提高你技巧的關鍵就是不斷地重複。練習，練習和更多的練習。
Key.Chinesesimp: 提高你技巧的关键就是不断地重复。练习，练习和更多的练习。

Key.Original: Just like a race track, memorize the Course of Fire, find legal shortcuts, time your reloads and be observant.
Key.Chinese: 就像是賽車，記憶每一個站點，找尋最佳捷徑，時間的掌控以及觀察力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 就像是赛车，记忆每一个站点，找寻最佳捷径，时间的掌控以及观察力。

Key.Original: Well, alright then, that just about wraps it up. I hope you found this useful. When you're ready, we can try Green again, or you can move on to other courses.
Key.Chinese: 好吧，好吧，先不講這麼多。我希望你能自己發現這些建議的好處。當你準備好時，我們可以在嘗試一次初級課程，或者你也可以往更高級的課程出發。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好吧，好吧，先不讲这么多。我希望你能自己发现这些建议的好处。当你准备好时，我们可以在尝试一次初级课程，或者你也可以往更高级的课程出发。

Key.Chinese: 快速從新開始射擊訓練。
Key.Chinesesimp: 快速从新开始射击训练。

Key.Original: Complete %1 as often as you'd like to improve your times!
Key.Chinese: 完成%1好來提高你的時間成績!
Key.Chinesesimp: 完成%1好来提高你的时间成绩！

Key.Original: Firing Drills - Check Point not clear
Key.Chinese: 射擊訓練-檢查點未肅清
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击训练—检查点未肃清

Key.Original: Select rule-set by shooting the special targets:
Key.Chinese: 透過射擊特殊目標來選擇規則:
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过射击特殊目标来选择规则：

Key.Chinese: 回到出發點:訓練重新開始中...
Key.Chinesesimp: 回到出发点：训练重新开始中...

Key.Original: Restart by shooting the special target %1, returning to the start, or by waiting 1 minute!
Key.Chinese: 透過射擊特殊目標%1來重新開始訓練，走回出發點，或者原地等待1分鐘!
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过射击特殊目标%1来重新开始训练，走回出发点，或者原地等待1分钟！

Key.Original: Get ready and prepare for firing drill.
Key.Chinese: 準備好開始進行射擊訓練。
Key.Chinesesimp: 准备好开始进行射击训练。

Key.Original: Exited Course of Fire: drill restarting ...
Key.Chinese: 退出靶場:訓練重新開始中...
Key.Chinesesimp: 退出靶场：训练重新开始中...

Key.Original: Clear all profile statistics for Firing Drills
Key.Chinese: 清除所有射擊訓練的紀錄
Key.Chinesesimp: 清除所有射击训练的纪录

Key.Original: Check CPs are clear and provide feedback
Key.Chinese: 檢查檢察點並提供回饋
Key.Chinesesimp: 检查检察点并提供回馈

Key.Original:
Welcome to %1!

Train or compete in this Firing Drill as often as you'd like and beat your best times!

Find more information about Firing Drills %2.
Key.Chinese:
歡迎來到%1!

在此靶場進行訓練或是競爭，常常練習好來增加你的最佳成績!

尋找更多關於射擊訓練的資訊%2。
Key.Chinesesimp:
欢迎来到%1！

在此靶场进行训练或是竞争，常常练习好来增加你的最佳成绩！

寻找更多关于射击训练的信息%2。

Key.Original: You may be asked to employ a specific stance at a Check Point. Doing this correctly can result in bonuses. Failure to do so may be penalized.
Key.Chinese: 你在一些站點可能會被要求作一些指定姿態。照作可以使你獲得獎勵。否則會獲得懲罰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在一些站点可能会被要求做些指定姿态。照做可以使你获得奖励。否则会获得惩罚。

Key.Original: You may be urged to use a specific weapon type at a Check Point. Doing this will be rewarded with bonuses. Not doing this may incur penalties.
Key.Chinese: 你在一些站點可能會被要求使用指定的武器。照作可以使你獲得獎勵。否則會獲得懲罰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你在一些站点可能会被要求使用指定武器。照做可以使你获得奖励。否则会获得惩罚。

Key.Original:
There are various types of targets that appear at Check Points:
%1Targets can appear immediately or after a little while.
%1Targets can disappear after a timeout.
%1Targets can move along rails.
%1Targets can activate after hitting another target.
%1Sometimes only specifically colored targets should be hit.
%1Targets may require multiple hits.
%1Accuracy zones on targets can reduce your time when struck.
%1Optional bonus targets lower your time.
%1No-shoot targets must not be engaged!

Targets can sometimes be randomly positioned or randomly appearing.
Key.Chinese:
有各種不同類型的目標會出現在檢查點:
%1目標有時會立即出現或過一會兒再出現。
%1目標將在時間結束後消失。
%1目標或許會沿著軌道移動。
%1目標將會在另一個目標被擊中時出現。
%1有時，只有那些有著特殊顏色的目標是該被射擊的。
%1有些目標須被射擊多槍。
%1準確的擊打你的目標可以有效減少時間。
%1可選獎勵目標可能會拖慢你的時間。
%1不能射擊目標是不能被擊倒的!

目標有時會隨機在不同位置出現。
Key.Chinesesimp:
有各种不同类型的目标会出现在检查点：
%1目标有时会立即出现或过一会儿再出现。
%1目标将在时间结束后消失。
%1目标或许会沿着轨道移动。
%1目标将会在另一个目标被击中时出现。
%1有时，只有那些有着特殊颜色的目标是该被射击的。
%1有些目标须被射击多枪。
%1准确的击打你的目标可以有效减少时间。
%1可选奖励目标可能会拖慢你的时间。
%1不能射击目标是不能被击倒的！

目标有时会随机在不同位置出现。

Key.Original: Check Points can define specific shooting boxes. When present, it's always better to engage from within these marked boxes.
Key.Chinese: 有些檢查點會有射擊框。當它存在時，透過它射擊是擊倒目標的最佳手段。
Key.Chinesesimp: 有些检查点会有射击框。当它存在时，透过它射击是击倒目标的最佳手段。

Key.Original:
When a COF uses Check Points, competitors move between them and usually engage all available targets before moving on.

Each Check Point may define special requirements such as the use of a specific weapon type or stance.

Keep an eye on the Check Point briefing and other indicators and memorize the COF well by training often.
Key.Chinese:
當靶場有使用到檢查點時，請在檢查點內擊倒所有可被擊倒之目標

每個檢查點都會有特殊要求，像是使用指定的武器與姿態等等。

請時時刻刻注意每個檢查點的限制。
Key.Chinesesimp:
当靶场有使用到检查点时，请在检查点内击倒所有可被击倒的目标

每个检查点都会有特殊要求，像是使用指定的武器与姿态等等。

请时时刻刻注意每个检查点的限制。

Key.Original:
A competitor's raw time is the amount of time it takes to reach the final Check Point, or to clear all targets for some courses.

Time may be deducted when you are awarded bonuses, or added when you are penalized.

When competing for medals, you can beat the bronze, silver and gold times. Sometimes a special time is available.
Key.Chinese:
競爭模式，會計算你抵達終點，與中間清裡檢查點的時間，統整後變為你的成績。

時間成績可以藉由打倒獎勵目標來提高你的時間記錄，反之則會進行扣分。

競爭的名次，會以青銅，白銀與黃金來作為你名次的象徵。亦有一些特殊的時間是可以被使用的。
Key.Chinesesimp:
竞争模式，会计算你抵达终点，与中间清理检查点的时间，整理后变为你的成绩。

时间成绩可以藉由打倒奖励目标来提高你的时间记录，反之则会进行扣分。

竞争的名次，会以青铜，白银与黄金来作为你名次的象征。亦有一些特殊的时间是可以被使用的。

Key.Original:
Firing Drills can be completed using one of two rule-sets: training and competitive.

%1Training: less strict and about familiarizing with the course. Medal times cannot be challenged while training.

%1Competitive: stricter rules and competitors are penalized when breaking rules. Medal times can be beaten here!
Key.Chinese:
射擊訓練的每個靶場都有兩種模式:訓練和競爭。

%1訓練:各站點的要求比較不嚴格，此模式是讓你熟悉此靶場的配置。在此模式之下，時間是不會被記錄的。

%1競爭:每個站點要求嚴謹，如果動作不正確，將會受到扣分處理。此模式下可以挑戰打破最佳紀錄!
Key.Chinesesimp:
射击训练的每个靶场都有两种模式：训练和竞争。

%1训练：各站点的要求不严格，此模式是让你熟悉此靶场的配置。在此模式之下，时间是不会被记录的。

%1竞争：每个站点要求严格，如果动作不正确，将会受到扣分处理。此模式下可以挑战打破最佳纪录！

Key.Original:
Firing Drills are a fun shooting sport to train and compete in.

Competitors complete a Course of Fire (COF), usually consisting of a series of Check Points with targets to engage at each one.

They refine their skills in the areas of movement, environmental awareness, weapon handling, shooting, prioritization and creativity.
Key.Chinese:
射擊訓練是一個能讓你開心學習，並透過競爭來讓你精益求精的地方。

要完成每一個靶場，通常只要擊倒每個站點的目標即可完成。

在這裡人們可以強化他的區域移動，環境意識，武器掌握，射擊，優先順序與創造力等等戰場上的技巧。
Key.Chinesesimp:
射击训练是一个能让你开心学习，并通过竞争来让你精益求精的地方。

要完成每一个靶场，通常只要击倒每个站点的目标即可完成。

在这里人们可以强化区域移动，环境意识，武器掌握，射击，优先顺序与创造力等等战场上的技巧。

Key.Original: Removing Firing Drills statistics cannot be undone!
Key.Chinese: 刪除射擊訓練的記錄時間，此動作是不能回復的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 删除射击训练的记录时间，此操作是不能恢复的！

Key.Original:
%1Firing Drills are not meant to be aced in one attempt. Study the courses, find shortcuts and get creative.

%1Observe on-screen Check Point briefings, voice instructions and other indicators to know which stance and weapon to use.

%1Plan your reloads and weapon switches well! Doing this in a smart way can save you many seconds.

%1Don't always trust the most direct route. Sometimes a detour can be quicker if there are no obstacles in your path.

%1Consider what will cost you more time: missing a target and re-engaging it, or moving on and taking the penalty.

%1Think about your aiming path from target to target, as well as clever use of fire modes. Remember that some targets offer bonuses for accuracy.

%1Scan for bonus targets, but balance your search time against the gained bonuses. Check your map for clues.

%1Not all targets appear upon arriving at a Check Point. Remain vigilant until the all clear is given.

%1Consider your fatigue and how often you sprint. It all affects your continued performance and aiming.
Key.Chinese:
%1射擊訓練並沒有所謂的標準作法。你必須在這邊自行研討各個站點的最佳解法，找尋捷徑，並使用一點創造力來幫助你提高成績。

%1觀察每個檢查點的簡報，語音指示或其他的指標，幫助你知道該用哪個姿態與武器。

%1計畫何時重裝彈藥與切換武器!作好的話可以有效減少許多浪費的秒數。

%1不要總是相信既定的路線。有時走過一些彎路，反而能更快抵達，前提是路上沒有障礙。

%1思考是什麼拖慢你的速度:錯失目標和重新擊打他，或者是移動錯誤而得到扣分。

%1想想你的射擊火線和開火模式，哪些組合才是最有效率的。請記住，有一些獎勵目標只會在你精準的擊倒後才會得到獎勵。

%1搜索獎勵目標，但請不要花太多時間去搜索。檢查你的地圖可以獲得一些線索。

%1並不是所有目標都會在你抵達檢查點時就跳出來。保持警覺，直到所有目標都擊倒為止。

%1聰明管理你的衝刺時間與疲勞程度。這些都會影響你的準度與續航力。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%1射击训练并没有所谓的标准做法。你必须在这边自行研讨各个站点的最佳解法，找寻捷径，并使用一点创造力来帮助你提高成绩。

%1观察每个检查点的简报，语音指示或其他的指标，帮助你知道该用哪个姿态与武器。

%1计划何时重装弹药与切换武器！做得好可以有效减少许多浪费的秒数。

%1不要总是相信既定的路线。有时走过一些弯路，反而能更快抵达，前提是路上没有障碍。

%1思考是什么拖慢你的速度：错失目标并重新射击，或者是移动错误而得到扣分。

%1想想你的射击火线和开火模式，哪些组合才是最有效率的。请记住，有一些奖励目标只会在你精准的击倒后才会得到奖励。

%1搜索奖励目标，但请不要花太多时间去搜索。检查你的地图可以获得一些线索。

%1并不是所有目标都会在你抵达检查点时就跳出来。保持警觉，直到所有目标都击倒为止。

%1聪明管理你的冲刺时间与疲劳程度。这些都会影响你的准度与续航力。

Key.Chinese: 射擊訓練-彈出式目標(大型)
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击训练—弹出式目标（大型）

Key.Chinese: 射擊訓練-彈出式目標(小型)
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击训练—弹出式目标（小型）

Key.Chinese: 射擊訓練-彈出式目標(大型)
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击训练—弹出式目标（大型）

Key.Chinese: 射擊訓練-彈出式目標(小型)
Key.Chinesesimp: 射击训练—弹出式目标（小型）

Key.Original: Show NATO top brass what you're made of during this CTRG demonstration drill. Are you ready for Miller's Fortress of Fun?
Key.Chinese: 在這個 CTRG 示範訓練中，讓 NATO 高層見識一下你的實力。你準備好要進入好玩的米樂要塞了嗎？
Key.Chinesesimp: 在本次 CTRG 演示操练过程中，向 NATO 高级军官展示你的才能。准备好体验 Miller 的“快乐堡垒”了吗？

Container.name: CheckPoints
Container.situation: radio feedback from the range officer to the competitor

Container.name: x15_ExtractionFailure
Container.situation: rook tells player that time is up for extraction

Key.Original: Fox, I've been spotted. I've got to extract, now!
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"，我已經被發現了。我現在必須先撤離了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"，我已经被发现了。我现在必须先撤离了！

Key.Original: I'm sorry, buddy, you're on your own. Keep your head down. Stay concealed until we can regroup. Good luck, Fox. Out.
Key.Chinese: 老兄，我很抱歉，你必須靠你自己了。謹慎行事。保持隱蔽直到我們能重新集結。祝好運，"狐狸"。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 老兄，我很抱歉，你必须靠你自己了。谨慎行事。保持隐蔽直到我们能重新集结。祝好运，"狐狸"。通话完毕。

Container.name: x10_ExtractionWarning
Container.situation: rook tells player that time is running out for extraction

Key.Original: I'm still en route, what's your status? Over.
Key.Chinese: 我還在路上，你的狀況怎樣?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我还在路上，你的状况怎样？完毕。

Key.Original: Increased enemy activity in the area. I can't hold this position for much longer, Fox. You've got to get to the extraction now.
Key.Chinese: 敵人在此區的活動變多。我無法在多待了，"狐狸"。你必須馬上抵達撤離點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌人在此区的活动变多。我无法再多待了，"狐狸"。你必须马上抵达撤离点。

Container.name: x05_TimeoutFailure
Container.situation: bishop tells player that time is up

Key.Original: Bishop to all teams, we've lost our chance. Mission is scrubbed. Fall back, fall back.
Key.Chinese: "主教"致所有小隊，我們錯失良機了。任務失敗。撤退，撤退。
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"呼叫各小组都有，我们错失良机了。任务失败。撤退，撤退。

Container.name: x01_TimeoutWarning
Container.situation: bishop tells player that time is running out

Key.Original: Fox, this is Bishop. Our window of opportunity is closing fast. You've got to get a move on!
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"，這裡是"主教"。我們的機會正接近當中。你必須快點行動了!
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"，这里是"主教"。我们的机会正迅速流逝。你必须快点行动了！

Container.name: 50_Extract_Complete
Container.situation: player gets to extract point

Key.Original: Fox, over here! C'mon, let's move it!
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"，在這裡!快來，讓我們離開這裡!
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"，在这里！快来，让我们离开这里！

Container.name: 45_Archangel_Secure
Container.situation: boat is at the extraction point - hurry up!

Key.Original: This is Bishop, Archangel is secure! We're falling back to the extraction point.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"主教"，已救到"大天使"!我們正撤退至撤離點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"主教"，已救出"大天使"！我们正撤退至撤离点。

Key.Original: All teams, outstanding work - now, let's get off this fucking rock!
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，幹的好-現在，讓我們離開這該死的地方!
Key.Chinesesimp: 各小组都有，干的好—现在让我们离开这该死的地方！

Container.name: 40_Extract
Container.situation: boat is at the extraction point - hurry up!

Key.Original: Fox, this is Rook, I'm at the exfil point. Get a move on.
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"，這裡是"白嘴鴉"，我在撤離點了。快點過來。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"，这里是"白嘴鸦"，我在撤离点了。快点过来。

Container.name: 35_Chaos_Threshold_Reached
Container.situation: bishop tells player the enemy is moving his way

Key.Original: Roger, Bishop, exfiltrating now. Good Luck, out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，"主教"，開始撤離。祝好運，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，"主教"，开始撤离。祝好运，通话完毕。

Key.Original: Fox, be advised, a hell of a lot of heat is heading your way. We're set to move on Archangel. 30 seconds. Prep for exfil, over.
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"，請注意，大量敵軍開始像你的位置過去了。我們正趕往"大天使"旁邊。30秒。準備撤離，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"，请注意，大量敌军开始朝你的位置过去了。我们正朝"大天使"移动。30秒。准备撤离，完毕。

Container.name: 30_Enemy_Is_Anxious
Container.situation: bishop tells player the enemy is behaving differently

Key.Original: Fox, update, I don't know what you just did but keep doing it - units on the move here. Out.
Key.Chinese: "狐狸"，情況更新，我不知道你幹了什麼，但是請你繼續做-敵軍開始離開這裡了。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狐狸"，情况更新，我不知道你干了什么，但是请你继续做—敌军开始离开这里了。通话完毕。

Container.name: 25_FirstContact
Container.situation: player let's bishop group know that he is starting the noise/chaos

Key.Original: Keep me updated. I don't want to be here a second longer than I have to. Fox out.
Key.Chinese: 保持聯絡。我不想任務成功但我卻被困住。"狐狸"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 保持联络。我不想在任务成功后被困住。"狐狸"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Confirmed, Fox, we're seeing activity here, over.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"狐狸"，我們從這裡看到一些動靜了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认，"狐狸"，我们从这里看到一些动静了，完毕。

Container.name: 20_Report_Arrival
Container.situation: player let's bishop group know that he is starting the noise/chaos

Key.Original: Bishop, I've just reached the bay. Be ready, over.
Key.Chinese: "主教"，我剛抵達港灣。請準備，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"，我刚抵达港湾。请准备，完毕。

Container.name: 15_Good_Luck
Container.situation: boat driver wishes good luck to the player

Container.name: 13_QuickBriefing3
Container.situation: player orders boat driver to slow down in order to stay undetected

Key.Original: Got it. We've been over this a thousand times.
Key.Chinese: 了解。我們已經演練不下一千次了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。我们已经演练不下一千次了。

Key.Original: Ok... we're approaching the bay. Move inland and get into a good position.
Key.Chinese: Ok...我們正接近港灣了。往內陸移動並尋找良好的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok...我们正接近港湾了。往内陆移动并寻找良好的位置。

Key.Original: Go loud, strike fast, and await confirmation. Bishop will only move on Archangel once it's clear. Understood?
Key.Chinese: 搞大聲點，行動要迅速，並等待確認。當你的任務成功之後，"主教"會拯救"大天使"。了解嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 搞出动静，行动要迅速，并等待确认。当你的任务成功之后，"主教"会拯救"大天使"。了解吗？

Container.name: 10_QuickBriefing2
Container.situation: player orders boat driver to slow down in order to stay undetected

Key.Chinese: 收到，"主教"。開始執行任務。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"主教"。开始执行任务。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Update: we have a visual on Archangel. Verified sighting.
Key.Chinese: 狀況更新:我們已經可以看到"大天使"了。確認目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 状况更新：我们已经可以看到"大天使"了。确认目标。

Key.Original: It's on you now. Proceed with the operation. Draw enemy forces South. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 現在看你們了。開始執行任務。把敵人引致南方。收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 现在看你们了。开始执行任务。把敌人引向南方。收到吗？

Container.name: 05_QuickBriefing1
Container.situation: player orders boat driver to slow down in order to stay undetected

Key.Original: Bishop in position. Eyes on objective. Multiple alpha victors -- wait one.
Key.Chinese: "主教"就定位了。看到目標。多名敵人--請稍待。
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"就位了。看到目标。多名敌人——请稍等。

Container.name: 03_Report_In
Container.situation: the boat reports in to bishop

Key.Original: Bishop, this is Rook. Approaching insertion point.
Key.Chinese: "主教"，這裡是"白嘴鴉"。正在接近滲透點。
Key.Chinesesimp: "主教"，这里是"白嘴鸦"。正在接近渗透点。

Key.Original: Solid copy. Bishop closing on objective, out.
Key.Chinese: 了解。"主教"正接近目標中，通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。"主教"正接近目标中，通话完毕。

Container.name: 01_Slow_Down
Container.situation: player orders boat driver to slow down in order to stay undetected

Key.Original: Ok, slow it down... quiet as possible from here on in.
Key.Chinese: Ok，慢下來...保持安靜直到裡面。
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，慢下来...从这里开始保持安静。

Key.Original: Sample Arma 3's enhanced night-time operations. Infiltrate enemy territory, create a distraction, and get out of there.
Key.Chinese: 體驗武裝突襲3增強的夜間作戰。滲透到敵方領土，分散他們的注意力，然後逃離那裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 体验武装突袭3增强的夜间作战。渗透到敌方领土，分散他们的注意力，然后逃离那里。

Key.Original: You were unable to get to the exfiltration in time and have been left stranded behind enemy lines on Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 你無法即時抵達撤離點，導致你被留在敵後。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你无法及时抵达撤离点，导致你被留在敌后。

Key.Original: Friendly fire will not be tolerated!
Key.Chinese: 友軍傷害是不被允許的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 友军伤害是不被允许的！

Key.Original: You were unable to create significant chaos and divert the enemy's attention away from Archangel. We've lost our only window of opportunity.
Key.Chinese: 你無法製造重大的混亂並引開敵人對"大天使"的注意力。我們已經失去唯一的機會了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你无法制造重大的混乱并引开敌人对"大天使"的注意力。我们已经失去唯一的机会了。

Key.Original: You successfully created a diversion and opened a window of opportunity for Bishop to extract Archangel.
Key.Chinese: 你成功製造混亂並為"主教"提供了機會好撤離"大天使"。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功制造混乱并为"主教"提供机会救出了"大天使"。

Key.Original: One of our most important assets, codename 'Archangel', has been captured by enemy forces. Intel suggests that preparations are being made to transfer our asset to an interrogation facility deep inside enemy territory. Time is short and our options are running out, but we cannot afford to let that happen.%1%1Archangel is currently being detained at the heavily fortified %3Camp Tempest%2. The enemy has the whole island locked down; a direct assault with a significant force is out of the question. We need to find a way to divert enemy units out of the area, giving a small recon team a strike window.%1%1%4Bishop%2 has already infiltrated the area and, under the cover of darkness, will approach Archangel's position from the north. You are tasked to deploy to the %5south%2 of the island, make contact, and raise as much hell as you can. Bishop will execute his mission only once you've done your job, so go loud. Destroy assets, raid camps, and compel the enemy to split its forces and investigate.%1%1We don't have all night: we expect Archangel to be transferred at roughly 2005; %4Bishop's%2 window of opportunity will only be open for around 20 minutes. You have some charges in your pack and the element of surprise on your side. Make sure you use them well, then get out of there.
Key.Chinese: 我們其中一個最重要的線民，代號'大天使'，已被敵軍部隊捉獲。情報指出，敵軍正在將其轉移到一處位在敵人領土上的審訊設施中。時間急迫且我們的選擇不多，我們不能讓他被轉移。%1%1"大天使"目前被關押在戒備森嚴的%3坦皮斯特營地%2。敵人已經使用優勢兵力封鎖全島了，所以我們無法使用大部隊的進攻方法。我們需要找到轉移敵人注意力的方法，好提供機會讓一支偵察隊伍去拯救目標。%1%1%3"主教"%2已經藉由夜色的保護滲透進該區，將從"大天使"的北方接近。你的任務是前進到%5島的南方%2，與敵人交戰並使他們的警戒提高。"主教"只能在你的任務成功後才能執行他們的計畫，所以請搞大聲點。摧毀他們的物資，突襲營地，迫使敵人的注意力轉向南方。%1%我們沒有整夜的時間:我們預期"大天使"大約會在21:05開始被轉移;%3"主教"%2將會有20分鐘的時間去拯救目標。你有一些炸藥在你的背包之中，可以讓你為敵人帶來一點驚喜。"狐狸"，請明智的使用它們，然後撤離那裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们其中一个最重要的线民，代号"大天使"，已被敌军部队抓获。情报指出，敌军正在将其转移到一处位于敌人领土上的审信设施中。时间急迫且我们的选择不多，我们不能让他被转移。%1%1大天使目前被关押在戒备森严的%3坦皮斯特营地%2。敌人已经使用优势兵力封锁全岛了，所以我们无法使用大部队的进攻方法。我们需要找到转移敌人注意力的方法，以便提供机会让一支侦察队伍去拯救目标。%1%1%3"主教"%2已经藉由夜色的保护渗透进该区，将从"大天使"的北方接近。你的任务是前进到%5岛的南方%2，与敌人交战并使他们的警戒程度提高。"主教"只能在你的任务成功后才能执行他们的计划，所以请搞大声点。摧毁他们的物资，突袭营地，迫使敌人的注意力转向南方。%1%我们没有整夜的时间：我们预计"大天使"会在21：05开始被转移;%3"主教"%2将会有20分钟的时间去拯救目标。在你的背包之中有一些炸药，可以让你为敌人带来一点惊喜。"狐狸"，请明智的使用它们，然后撤离那里。

Key.Original: %3Bishop%2 - Operation lead, forward observer%1%4Fox%2 - You%1%5Rook%2 - Insertion and exfiltration unit
Key.Chinese: %3"主教"%2-任務指揮官，前進觀察員%1%4"狐狸"%2-你%1%5"白嘴鴉"%2-負責滲透與撤離的單位
Key.Chinesesimp: %3"主教"%2-任务指挥官，前进观察员%1%4"狐狸"%2-你%1%5"白嘴鸦"%2-负责渗透与撤离的单位

Key.Original: Infiltrate enemy territory and make contact. Go loud. Destroy assets, raid camps. Force the enemy to divert units to the south of the island, then exfiltrate.
Key.Chinese: 滲透到敵方領地並與敵人交戰。搞大聲點。摧毀物資，突襲營地。迫使敵人把注意力轉向島的南方，然後撤離。
Key.Chinesesimp: 渗透到敌方领地并与敌人交战。搞大声点。摧毁物资，突袭营地。迫使敌人把注意力转向岛的南方，然后撤离。

Key.Original: %2. Get to the %6infiltration point%7.%1%3. Make contact.%1%4. Force the enemy to divert units to the south.%1%5. Exfiltrate
Key.Chinese: %2. 抵達滲透點。%1%3. 與敵人交戰。%1%4. 迫使敵人把注意力轉向島的南方。%1%5. 撤離
Key.Chinesesimp: %2. 抵达渗透点。%1%3. 与敌人交战。%1%4. 迫使敌人把注意力转向岛的南方。%1%5. 撤离

Key.Original: Rendezvous with the exfil unit, Rook, and leave Stratis
Key.Chinese: 與撤離單位"白嘴鴉"會合，然後離開斯特拉蒂斯島
Key.Chinesesimp: 与撤离单位"白嘴鸦"会合，然后离开斯特拉蒂斯岛

Key.Original: Raise hell in the south of Stratis. Divert the enemy's attention away from Bishop's objective.
Key.Chinese: 使斯特拉蒂斯島的南方混亂。迫使敵人轉移其注意力到島的南方，好讓"主教"可以拯救他的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在斯特拉蒂斯岛的南部制造混乱。迫使敌人转移其注意力到岛的南方，好让"主教"可以拯救他的目标。

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: NIGHT - Dynamic Lights, Refined HDR Lighting, Improved Fog
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:夜間-動態光源，更加精製的光源特效，進步的煙霧效果
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示：夜间—动态光源，更加精致的光源特效，进步的烟雾效果

Key.Original: The village has fallen. Retreat to the %2south%1!
Key.Chinese: 我們已經失去村莊了。撤退至%2南方%1!
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经失去村庄了。撤退至%2南方%1！

Key.Chinese: 在%3敵軍部隊%1的攻擊下防守%2"吉爾納"%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%3敌军部队%1的攻击下防守%2格尔纳%1。

Key.Original: Take command of the team at %2Strogos Bay%1.
Key.Chinese: 指揮在%2斯特羅戈斯海灣%1的部隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 指挥在%2斯特罗戈斯湾%1的部队。

Key.Chinese: 接近斯特羅戈斯海灣中

Key.Original: Get to grips with Arma 3's squad commanding. Regroup with your team and defend a village against an enemy assault.
Key.Chinese: 體驗武裝突襲3的小隊指揮。與你的小隊重新集結，並在敵人的攻擊下防守村莊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 体验武装突袭3的小队指挥。与你的小队重新集结，并在敌人的攻击下防守村庄。

Key.Original: Friendly fire will not be tolerated!
Key.Chinese: 友軍傷害是不被允許的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 友军伤害是不被允许的！

Key.Original: Poor leadership and disobeyed orders have resulted in the loss of the village. We've lost our west flank and, with it, the security of the south of Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 領導不力與違抗命令直接造成我們失去村莊的事實。失去我們的西翼，將使斯特拉蒂斯南部的安全性變低。
Key.Chinesesimp: 领导不力与违抗命令直接造成我们失去村庄。因为失去我们的西翼，令斯特拉蒂斯南部的安全性变低。

Key.Original: Forced into retreat, you've failed to halt the enemy offensive. We've lost our west flank and, with it, the security of the south of Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 被迫撤退，你不能阻擋敵人的進攻。失去我們的西翼，將使斯特拉蒂斯南部的安全性變低。
Key.Chinesesimp: 被迫撤退，你不能阻挡敌人的进攻。失去我们的西翼，令斯特拉蒂斯南部的安全性变低。

Key.Original: Against a superior force, you've managed to hold the village, but at a heavy cost. We're desperately thin on the ground now, Bravo.
Key.Chinese: 在敵人強勢的兵力之下，你成功守住了村莊，但也付出沉痛的代價。Bravo，我們在地面上的單位已經所剩無幾了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在敌人强势的兵力之下，你成功守住了村庄，但也付出沉痛的代价。Bravo，我们在地面上的单位已经所剩无几。

Key.Original: Against a superior force, you've managed to hold the village, incurring only small losses. Outstanding work, Bravo team. At times like this, we need men like you.
Key.Chinese: 在敵人強勢的兵力之下，你成功守住了村莊，並且沒有付出太多的損失。幹的好，Bravo小隊。在這種時候，我們就需要像你們這樣的人。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在敌人强势的兵力之下，你成功守住了村庄，并且没有付出太多的损失。干的好，Bravo 小组。在这种时候，我们就需要像你们这样的人。

Key.Original:
Hours ago, enemy forces launched an unexpected amphibious assault on Stratis. They quickly seized the north and are now steadily advancing south, driving us into the sea.

Many key facilities and bases have been lost. The only hope for our remaining forces is to dig in and hold on until proper reinforcements can arrive. Our numbers are thin. It's imperative that we're not out-flanked.

The rest of %2your team%1 is awaiting your arrival. A reduced squad - Foxtrot - have already taken up position in Girna and established a small defensive %3minefield%1. %4Hawkeye%1, an advanced recon element, is observing the enemy and will update you on their activity.
Key.Chinese:
數小時前，敵人對斯特拉蒂斯島發動意想不到的兩棲突擊。他們迅速控制了島嶼的北方，同時穩健的向南方推進，想把我們趕入海上。

我們已經失去了許多關鍵設施與基地。我們唯一的希望就是好好防禦剩下的領土，直到援軍抵達。我們的人數稀少。當務之急，就是確保我們的側翼。

你剩下的%2小隊%1正在等待你的抵達。一個小隊-Foxtrot-已經在吉爾納村莊就定位並設置了一個防禦性%3地雷區%1。%4"鷹眼"%1，一位前進觀察員，會隨時像你回報敵人的動靜。
Key.Chinesesimp:
数小时前，敌人对斯特拉蒂斯岛发动意想不到的两栖突击。他们迅速控制了岛屿的北方，同时稳定的向南方推进，想把我们赶入海里。

我们已经失去了许多关键设施与基地。我们唯一的希望就是好好防御剩下的领土，直到援军抵达。我们的人数稀少。当务之急，就是确保我们的侧翼。

你剩下的%2小队%1正在等待你的抵达。一个小队-Foxtrot-已经在格尔纳村就位并设置了一个防御性%3地雷区%1。%4"鹰眼"%1，一名前进观察员，会随时向你回报敌人的动静。

Key.Original:
%2BRAVO%1 - onboard MH-9, tasked with defending the %3Girna sector%1
%2CHARLIE%1 - onboard MH-9, reinforcements for %4Mike-26%1
%5FOXTROT%1 - survivors from %6Camp Tempest%1
%7HAWKEYE%1 - scout observing %6Camp Tempest%1
%8PAPA BEAR%1 - Stratis HQ
Key.Chinese:
%2Bravo%1-在MH-9直升機上，任務是防禦%3吉爾納村莊%1
%2Charlie%1-在MH-9直升機上，為%4Mike-26%1的增援部隊
%5Foxtrot%1-從%6坦皮斯特營地%1中倖存的部隊
%7"鷹眼"%1-正在偵察%6坦皮斯特營地%1
%8Papa Bear%1-斯特拉蒂斯島總部
Key.Chinesesimp:
%2Bravo%1-在 MH-9直升机上，任务是防御%3格尔纳村%1
%2Charlie%1-在 MH-9直升机上，为%4 Mike-26%1的增援部队
%5Foxtrot%1-从%6坦皮斯特营地%1中幸存的部队
%7"鹰眼"%1-正在侦察%6坦皮斯特营地%1
%8Papa Bear%1-斯特拉蒂斯岛指挥部

Key.Original: Link up with and take command of your men. Rally at Girna - a village directly in the path of advancing enemy forces - and prepare a defense.
Key.Chinese: 與你的小隊會合并指揮他們。在吉爾納集結-一個在敵人要去南方路上的必經村莊-然後準備防禦。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与你的小队会合并指挥他们。在格尔纳集结—一个在敌人要去南方路上的必经村庄—然后准备防御。

Key.Original:
1. Link up with the team awaiting your arrival at %2Strogos bay%1
2. Move to the %3village%1 and assume command of what remains of %4Foxtrot%1
3. Set up a defense and confirm your status with %5HQ%1 via radio
4. Hold the village against enemy forces %6advancing%1 from the north
Key.Chinese:
1. 與正在%2斯特羅戈斯海灣%1等待你的小隊會合
2. 移動到%3村莊%1并接手%4Foxtrot%1小隊的指揮權
3. 設置防禦措施然後使用無線電向%5總部%1回報
4. 防禦來自%6北方%1敵人的攻擊，守住村莊
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 与正在%2斯特罗戈斯湾%1等待你的小队会合
2. 移动到%3村庄%1并接手%4Foxtrot%1小队的指挥权
3. 设置防御措施然后使用无线电向%5总部%1回报
4. 防御来自%6北方%1敌人的攻击，守住村庄

Key.Original: Against a superior force, you've managed to hold the village without a single loss. Outstanding work, Bravo team. At times like this, we need men like you.
Key.Chinese: 儘管面對強烈的攻勢，你還是成功的守住了村莊並且沒有損失任何一個人。幹得好，Bravo小隊。在此時此刻，我們正需要你這種人才。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管面对强烈的攻势，你还是成功的守住了村庄并且没有损失任何人。干得好，Bravo 小组。在此时此刻，我们正需要你这种人才。

Container.name: x20_Not_Reporting
Container.participants: PB B HQ;PB B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: hq calling player why is he not reporting

Key.Original: Carry on, but, be advised, we can't send you more men. You're on your own, Bravo. Hold that village. Protect our flank. Good luck, Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: 繼續做，但請注意，我們不能再派遣更多的人手給你們了。Bravo，你們必須靠自己了。守住村莊。保護我們的側翼。祝好運，Papa Bear通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 继续做，但请注意，我们不能再派遣更多的人手给你们了。Bravo，你们必须靠自己了。守住村庄。保护我们的侧翼。祝好运，Papa Bear 通话完毕。

Key.Original: We're doing the best we can, sir. Just a minute and we'll be ready.
Key.Chinese: 長官，我們正盡我們最大的努力。請再等一下我們就準備好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，我们正尽我们最大的努力。请再等一下我们就准备好了。

Container.name: x15_Away
Container.situation: player outside of ao

Key.Original: Where the hell am I? I should take a look at the map...
Key.Chinese: 我在哪裡阿?我應該看一下地圖...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在哪里啊？我应该看一下地图...

Container.name: x10_Late
Container.situation: player to himself when he takes too much time to get into the village

Key.Original: Dammit, we need to get a move on! Foxtrot can't hold the village alone!
Key.Chinese: 他媽的，我們必須趕快移動!Foxtrot無法獨自守住村莊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 他妈的，我们必须赶快移动！Foxtrot 无法独自守住村庄！

Container.name: x05_Retreat
Container.participants: PB B Bravo Lead;PB B HQ;
Container.situation: player informing hq about mission failure

Key.Original: Understood Bravo, get out of there now. We'll have to regroup and reassess.
Key.Chinese: 了解，Bravo，趕快離開那裡。我們必須重新集結並評估。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，Bravo，赶快离开那里。我们必须重新集结并评估形势。

Key.Original: Papa Bear to all squads, be advised, Bravo just lost Girna. The west flank is not secure - be careful out there!
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear致所有小隊，請注意，Bravo剛失去了吉爾納村莊。我們的西翼已不安全-請小心!
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear 致各班都有，请注意，Bravo 刚失去了格尔纳村。我们的西翼已不安全—请小心！

Key.Original: Bravo to Papa Bear, we've sustained heavy casualties and have to pull back, over!
Key.Chinese: Bravo致Papa Bear，我們遭受重大的傷亡，我們必須向後撤，完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: Bravo 致 Papa Bear，我们遭受重大的伤亡，我们必须后撤，完毕！

Container.name: x01_Transport_Immobile
Container.situation: player mumbling to himself about immobilized vehicle

Container.name: 35_Victory
Container.participants: PB B Bravo Lead;PB B HQ;
Container.situation: player informing hq of his success

Key.Original: Outstanding! Dig in and await further orders.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好!留在原地並等待進一步命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好！留在原地并等待进一步命令。

Key.Original: Papa Bear to all squads, be advised, Bravo has held Girna. West flank is secure. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear致所有小隊，請注意，Bravo已經守住了吉爾納村莊。西翼已安全。Papa Bear通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear 致各班都有，请注意，Bravo 已经守住了格尔纳村。西翼已安全。Papa Bear 通话完毕。

Key.Original: Alright, gentlemen, the village is ours!
Key.Chinese: 好的，先生們，村莊是我們的了!
Key.Chinesesimp: 好的，先生们，村庄是我们的了！

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Bravo, we've successfully defended Girna, over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，這裡是Bravo，我們成功防守住吉爾納村莊了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，这里是 Bravo，我们成功防守住格尔纳村了，完毕。

Container.name: 30_Attack
Container.participants: PB B Hawkeye;PB B Bravo Lead;
Container.situation: hawkeye informing player about incoming enemies

Key.Original: Solid copy, Hawkeye, we'll keep our eyes open. Thanks for the heads up. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，"鷹眼"，我們會持續觀察。感謝你的情報。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"鹰眼"，我们会持续观察。感谢你的情报。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Bravo, message, OPFOR advancing on your grid; they're just minutes away.
Key.Chinese: Bravo，訊息，敵軍正往你們的座標前進;他們只剩下幾分鐘的路程。
Key.Chinesesimp: Bravo，信息，敌军正往你们的位置前进;他们只剩下几分钟的路程。

Key.Original: Also, be advised, an assault boat just left the base. It's bearing due west for now. How copy?
Key.Chinese: 同時，請注意，一艘突擊艇剛離開他們的基地。它將會從你們的西面靠近。有收到嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 同时，请注意，一艘突击艇刚离开他们的基地。它将会从你们的西面靠近。有收到吗？

Container.name: 25_Reporting
Container.participants: PB B Bravo Lead;PB B HQ;
Container.situation: player informing hq that he is prepared

Key.Original: Negative, none at this time. We're facing the same situation all across the island.
Key.Chinese: 否定，現在沒有。現在全島都面臨這種狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不，现在没有。现在全岛都面临这种状况。

Key.Original: Hold that village. Protect our flank and good luck. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: 守住村莊。保護好我們的側翼，祝好運。Papa Bear通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 守住村庄。保护好我们的侧翼，祝好运。Papa Bear 通话完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Bravo, update.
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，这里是 Bravo，状况更新。

Key.Original: We're all set here - the village is covered - but we're thin on the ground. Is any further support available?
Key.Chinese: 我們已經準備好了-村莊正在我們的保護之下-但我們的人數過於稀少。有任何可以使用的支援嗎?
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们已经准备好了—村庄正在我们的保护之下—但我们的人数过于稀少。有任何可以使用的支援吗？

Container.name: 23_Girna_Advice
Container.situation: the player gives advice to his team about what to do

Key.Original: Ok, listen up. OPFOR are advancing on our position from the north. A group on point and a main force in support.
Key.Chinese: Ok，聽好了。敵軍正從北方接近我們當中。一個小隊將會前來，而且他們有主力部隊的支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，听好了。敌军正从北方接近我们当中。一个尖刀组，后面有主力部队支援。

Key.Original: The hill to the south is an ideal spot for overwatch: plenty of concealment and hard cover.
Key.Chinese: 前面那座小山坡很適合當作觀察點:而且有著一些不錯的掩護。
Key.Chinesesimp: 前面那座小山坡很适合当作观察点：而且有着一些不错的掩护。

Key.Original: We'll draw them in, then give 'em hell. Questions? ... Good. Let's go.
Key.Chinese: 我們會守住，然後把他們打回地獄。有問題嗎?...非常好。我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们会守住，然后给他们好看。有问题吗？...非常好。我们走吧。

Container.name: 20_Girna
Container.participants: PB B Bravo Lead;PB B HQ;
Container.situation: rendezvous with remains of foxtrot squad in girna

Key.Original: Copy. Report in once you've prepared your defences, over.
Key.Chinese: 收到。當你們準備好防禦措施時像我們回報，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。当你们准备好防御措施时向我们回报，完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, Bravo, we've linked up with Foxtrot in Girna. Hawkeye reports multiple contacts en route from the north, over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，Bravo，我們已經在吉爾納與Foxtrot會合了。"鷹眼"回報有許多的部隊已經在北方過來的路上，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，Bravo，我们已经在格尔纳与 Foxtrot 会合了。"鹰眼"报告称有许多的部队已经在北方过来的路上，完毕。

Container.name: 15_Situation
Container.participants: PB B Bravo Lead;PB B Hawkeye;
Container.situation: hawkeye informs player about situation

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Hawkeye, thanks for the intel. Keep us updated.
Key.Chinese: 確認，"鷹眼"，感謝你的情報。保持聯繫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 确认，"鹰眼"，感谢你的情报。保持联系。

Key.Original: Bravo, this is Hawkeye, I've got a visual on OPFOR movement one click north of Girna.
Key.Chinese: Bravo，這裡是"鷹眼"，我已經發現一支部隊在吉爾納的北方。
Key.Chinesesimp: Bravo，这里是"鹰眼"，我发现在格尔纳以北一公里处有红军活动。

Key.Original: Two squads, around ... twenty or so in total - split into an advanced element and a main force, over.
Key.Chinese: 兩支小隊，人數大概...二十人左右-為大部隊的前鋒隊伍，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 两个班，人数大概...二十人左右—分为尖刀分队和主力，完毕。

Container.name: 13_En_Route
Container.participants: PB B Bravo Lead;PB B HQ;
Container.situation: player reporting to hq, than speaking to his subordinates

Key.Original: Understood, Bravo. Proceed as planned. Out.
Key.Chinese: 了解，Bravo。按計畫進行。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，Bravo。按计划进行。通话完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Bravo: I've linked up with my squad and we're en route to the the village now, over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，這裡是Bravo:我已經與我的小隊會合，我們已經在前往村莊的路上了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，这里是 Bravo：我已经与我的小队会合，我们已经在前往村庄的路上了，完毕。

Container.name: 10_Beach
Container.situation: player reporting to hq, than speaking to his subordinates

Key.Original: Ok, gentlemen, quick SITREP. Enemy forces advancing on our position from the north.
Key.Chinese: Ok，先生們，快速簡報一下。敵軍部隊正從北方向我們的位置挺進。
Key.Chinesesimp: Ok，先生们，快速简报一下。敌军部队正从北方向我们的位置挺进。

Key.Original: Our task is to intercept them and secure Girna. Let's go.
Key.Chinese: 我們的任務是攔截他們並確保吉爾納村莊。我們走。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们的任务是拦截他们并确保格尔纳村。我们走。

Container.name: 05_Landing
Container.situation: player - first half silently to himself, second normally to his subordinate, levine

Key.Original: Here we go... Levine, get set for landing. We need to link up with the rest of the squad and move out ASAP.
Key.Chinese: 讓我們開始吧...萊文，準備著陸。我必須盡快與剩下的隊員會合。
Key.Chinesesimp: 让我们开始吧...莱文，准备着陆。我必须尽快与剩下的队员会合。

Container.name: 01_Prolog
Container.participants: PB B Bravo Lead;PB B HQ;
Container.situation: prolog, player and hq discussing situation

Key.Original: Copy that, Bravo - good to hear from you.
Key.Chinese: 收到，Bravo-真高興聽到你的聲音。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，Bravo-真高兴听到你的声音。

Key.Original: Stratis Airbase and Kamino have fallen. Enemy forces are advancing south towards our positions.
Key.Chinese: 斯特拉蒂斯空軍基地與卡米諾皆已失去。敵軍部隊正從北方向我們的位置挺進。
Key.Chinesesimp: 斯特拉蒂斯空军基地与卡米诺皆已失去。敌军部队正从北方向我们的位置挺进。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Bravo, approaching southern coast of Stratis now, over.
Key.Chinese: Papa Bear，這裡是Bravo，正在接近斯特拉蒂斯島的南岸，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear，这里是 Bravo，正在接近斯特拉蒂斯岛的南岸，完毕。

Key.Original: We cannot afford to get flanked, Bravo. Take command of your squad and reinforce the village to the north.
Key.Chinese: 我們不能失去我們的側翼，Bravo。指揮你的小隊並援助北方的村莊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们不能失去我们的侧翼，Bravo。指挥你的班并援助北方的村庄。

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: COMMANDING - Basic Squad Command, Town Defense, Refined Radio Chatter
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:指揮-基礎小隊指揮，防禦城鎮，進步的無線電對答
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示：指挥—基础小队指挥，防御城镇，进步的无线电对答

Container.name: 45_Away
Container.situation: player outside of ao

Key.Original: Where the hell am I? I should take a look at the map...
Key.Chinese: 我在哪裡阿?我應該看一下地圖...
Key.Chinesesimp: 我在哪里啊？我应该看一下地图...

Key.Original: Get a taste of Arma 3's combined arms gameplay. Seize an enemy encampment with the help of motorized infantry and close air support.
Key.Chinese: 體驗武裝突襲3的聯合作戰。協同友軍的機械化步兵與密接空中支援，進行肅清敵人營地的任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 体验武装突袭3的联合作战。协同友军的机械化步兵与近距离空中支援，进行肃清敌人营地的任务。

Key.Original: You were unable to complete your objective. We've lost the opportunity to strike a critical blow to the enemy.
Key.Chinese: 你無法完成你的目標。我們已經失去給敵人痛擊的機會。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你无法完成你的目标。我们已经失去给敌人痛击的机会。

Key.Original: You seized the enemy compound but failed to adequately secure the Extraction LZ, leading to the loss of a helo. Our other operations will be critically weakened without this support.
Key.Chinese: 你成功殲滅了敵方營地，但是未能肅清撤離降落點，導致我們失去了一架直升機。在接下來的任務我們將會因為沒有這項支援而顯得非常虛弱。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功歼灭了敌方营地，但是未能肃清撤离降落点，导致我们失去了一架直升机。在接下来的任务我们将会因为没有这项支援而显得非常虚弱。

Key.Original: You seized the enemy compound but were unable to RV with the extraction helo. Our other operations will be critically weakened without your support.
Key.Chinese: 你成功殲滅了敵方營地，但你未能抵達撤離降落點。在接下來的任務我們將會因為沒有你的支援而顯得非常虛弱。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功歼灭了敌方营地，但你未能抵达撤离降落点。在接下来的任务我们将会因为没有你的支援而显得非常虚弱。

Key.Original: You successfully seized the enemy compound, secured the LZ, and prepared for the next operation.
Key.Chinese: 你成功殲滅了敵方營地，並肅清了降落點，請準備好執行下一個行動。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功歼灭了敌方营地，并肃清了降落点，请准备好执行下一个行动。

Key.Original: Following our successful assault on Stratis %3Airbase%2 and the seizure of the Agia Marina %4Military Range%2, the enemy has withdrawn to a small compound %5to the east%2.%1%1Our offensive has weakened the enemy's west flank. We're now in a good position to strike a further blow and seize the encampment before they can effectively regroup. We'll execute a combined-arms assault and clear out enemy forces from the area.%1%1Close Air Support will be provided by Whiskey-Six, and motorized infantry, callsign Echo, will support the attack. However, be advised that enemy forces still have a foothold in the north and east. We should expect to encounter possible reinforcements from the %6Kamino area%2.
Key.Chinese: 在我們成功突擊斯特拉蒂斯%3空軍基地%2與肅清聖馬里納的%4軍事靶場%2之後，敵人已經被我們逼退到%5東方的一個小營地%2。%1%1我們的進攻成功削弱了敵方的西翼。我們現在正處於絕佳的位置上，我們將在敵方可以集結剩餘的兵力之前，進一步打擊他們的營地。這次作戰是一次多兵種的聯合作戰，一起把敵方從該區趕走。%1%1密接空中支援將由"Whiskey-6"提供，還有一支呼號為Echo的摩托化步兵小隊，他們將協同你進攻。然而，我們還是必須小心，敵人在島的北方與東方仍有立足之地。我們必須預期敵人會有援軍從%6卡米諾地區%2趕來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在我们成功突击斯特拉蒂斯%3空军基地%2并肃清圣马里纳%4军事靶场%2之后，敌人已经被我们逼退到%5东方的一个小营地%2。%1%1我们的进攻成功削弱了敌方的西翼。我们现在正处于绝佳的位置上，我们将在敌方可以集结剩余的兵力之前，进一步打击他们的营地。这次作战是一次诸兵种合成作战，一起把敌方从该区赶走。%1%1近距离空中支援将由 Whiskey-6"提供，还有一支呼号为 Echo 的摩托化步兵小队，他们将协同你进攻。然而，我们还是必须小心，敌人在岛的北方与东方仍有立足之地。我们必须预设敌人会有援军从%6卡米诺地区%2赶来。

Key.Original: %3Alpha%2 - Infantry squad%1%3Bravo%2 - Your team%1Echo - Motorized supporting unit%1Whisky-6 - Close Air Support%1Golf-1 - Alpha air transport unit%1Golf-2 - Bravo air transport unit%1Papa Bear - HQ
Key.Chinese: %3Alpha%2-步兵班%1%3Bravo%2-你的小隊%1Echo-摩托化支援單位%1"Whisky-6"-密接空中支援%1"Golf-1"-Alpha的空中運輸單位%1"Golf-2"-Bravo的空中運輸單位%1Papa Bear-總部
Key.Chinesesimp: %3Alpha%2-步兵班%1%3Bravo%2-你的小组%1Echo-摩托化支援单位%1Whiskey-6"-近距离空中支援%1Golf-1"-Alpha 的空中运输单位%1Golf-2"-Bravo 的空中运输单位%1Papa Bear-指挥部

Key.Original: In coordination with Close Air Support and motorized infantry, assault and secure the enemy %2position%1.
Key.Chinese: 在密接空中支援與摩托化步兵的幫助下，突擊並肅清敵方%2營地%1。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在近距离空中支援与摩托化步兵的帮助下，突击并肃清敌方%2营地%1。

Key.Original: %5. Deploy to the %3west%2 of the enemy position.%1%6. Assault and secure the enemy %4camp%2.%1%7. Prepare for extraction and await further orders.
Key.Chinese: %5. 佈署在敵軍營地的%3西方%2。%1%6. 突擊並肅清敵方%4營地%2。%1%7. 準備撤離並等待進一步指示。
Key.Chinesesimp: %5. 布署在敌军营地的%3西方%2。%1%6. 突击并肃清敌方%4营地%2。%1%7. 准备撤离并等待进一步指示。

Key.Original: Assault and secure the enemy compound
Neutralize enemy reinforcements inbound from the east
Key.Chinese: 殲滅從東方來的敵方援軍
Key.Chinesesimp: 歼灭从东方来的敌方援军

Key.Original: Move to the extraction point and secure the LZ; board the helo and await further orders
Key.Chinese: 移動到撤離點並肅清該區;搭乘直升機並等待進一步指示
Key.Chinesesimp: 移动到撤离点并肃清该区;搭乘直升机并等待进一步指示

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: COMBINED ARMS I. - Close Air Support, Armored Vehicles, Anti-tank Weapons
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:聯合作戰I。-密接空中支援，武裝載具，反坦克武器
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示：联合作战I。-近距离空中支援，武装载具，反坦克武器

Container.name: 01_Ready_up
Container.situation: insertion chopper pilot lets troops know that they are approaching the lz and should be ready to leave the chopper

Container.name: x05_ImpossibleTask
Container.situation: the objective can't be met for some reason, e.g., no way to defeat apcs, etc

Key.Original: All teams, fall back - I say again - fall back!
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，撤退-我再說一遍-撤退!
Key.Chinesesimp: 各组都有，撤退—我再说一遍—撤退！

Key.Original: Link up with reinforcements at Point Gamma and await further orders. Out.
Key.Chinese: 與援軍在伽馬點會合後等待進一步命令。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与援军在伽马点会合后等待进一步命令。通话完毕。

Container.name: x01_Extraction_Leaves
Container.situation: transport warns players it won't wait for them any longer to board the choppers and will leave

Key.Original: Bravo, this is Golf-2, we can't stay here any longer. You're on your own! Out.
Key.Chinese: Bravo，這裡是"Golf-2"，我們不能再待在這裡。你們只能靠自己了!通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Bravo，这里是 Golf-2"，我们不能再待在这里。你们只能靠自己了！通话完毕。

Container.name: 40_Reinforcements_Eliminated
Container.situation: hq informs alpha about extraction

Key.Original: Outstanding, Bravo. OPFOR are falling back.
Alpha, hold position at the base. Bravo, dispatching Golf-2 for pick up. Secure the LZ and board the helo. We need additional support in the south. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: Alpha，請守住現在的位置。Bravo，我們將派遣"Golf-2"去接應你們。肅清降落點並搭乘直升機。我們需要你們去南方支援。Papa Bear通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha，请守住现在的位置。Bravo，我们将派遣 Golf-2"去接应你们。肃清降落点并搭乘直升机。我们需要你们去南方支援。Papa Bear 通话完毕。

Container.name: 35_Defeat_Reinforcements
Container.situation: hq confirms objective seized

Key.Original: Alpha, Bravo, be advised, enemy counter-attack inbound.
Key.Chinese: Alpha，Bravo，請注意，敵人援軍接近中。
Key.Chinesesimp: Alpha，Bravo，请注意，敌人援军接近中。

Key.Original: It's likely they'll converge on your location. Expect a counter attack from the east. Hold your position. Out.
Key.Chinese: 他們很可能會從你們的東方前來。守住你們的位置。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 他们很可能会从你们的东方前来。守住你们的位置。通话完毕。

Container.name: 30_Seized_Base
Container.situation: hq confirms objective seized

Key.Original: All teams, objective secured. Good work out there. Papa Bear Out.
Key.Chinese: 所有小隊，目標已肅清。你們做的不錯。Papa Bear通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有小队，目标已肃清。你们做的不错。Papa Bear 通话完毕。

Container.name: 25_CAS_Leaves
Container.situation: cas warns ground troops he is leaving to base

Key.Original: This is Whisky-6, we're moving on to our next strike target.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"Whisky-6"，我們正前往下一個攻擊目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是 Whiskey-6"，我们正前往下一个攻击目标。

Key.Original: Good luck down there, Bravo. Out.

Container.name: 20_Start_Assault
Container.situation: hq warns all units that the assault will begin

Key.Original: Papa Bear to Alpha, Bravo, Echo, Whiskey-6 - commence the assault. Out.
Key.Chinesesimp: Papa Bear 致 Alpha，Bravo，Echo，Whiskey-6"-开始突击。通话完毕。

Container.name: 15_Insertion_Complete
Container.participants: PB B Golf One;PB B Golf Two;PB B HQ;
Container.situation: choppers confirm the insertion

Key.Original: Golf-2, troops on the deck! Going into holding pattern.
Key.Chinese: "Golf-2"，部隊都已經下來了!前往等待地點。
Key.Chinesesimp: Golf-2，部队都已经下来了！前往等待地点。

Container.name: 10_Ambient_Chatter_2
Container.participants: PB B Wisky Six;PB B HQ;
Container.situation: ambient chatter from whisky-6 (cas)

Key.Original: Copy that. Be advised, friendly forces approaching objective from the west, over.
Key.Chinese: 收到。請注意，友軍部隊正從目標西側接近中，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。请注意，友军部队正从目标西侧接近中，完毕。

Key.Original: This is Whisky-6, CAS en route to target location.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"Whisky-6"，密接空中支援正前往目標位置中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是 Whiskey-6，近距离空中支援正前往目标位置中。

Key.Original: Understood, Papa Bear, friendlies in the AO.
Key.Chinese: 了解，Papa Bear，友軍正在任務區域中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，Papa Bear，友军正在任务区域中。

Container.name: 05_Ambient_Chatter_1
Container.participants: PB B Golf Two;PB B HQ;PB B Echo Lead;
Container.situation: ambient chatter from echo (apc)

Key.Original: Echo Lead, birds are inbound! What's your status, over?
Key.Chinese: Echo隊長，直升機正在進入中!你們的狀況如何，完畢?
Key.Chinesesimp: Echo 领队，直升机正在进入中！你们的状况如何，完毕？

Key.Original: Papa Bear, Golf-2, approaching objective, over.
Golf-2, be advised, LZ is hot. Echo will provide support in the assault. Out.
Key.Chinese: "Golf-2"，請注意，降落點很危險。Echo會開始突擊並提供支援。通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: Golf-2"，请注意，降落点很危险。Echo 会开始突击并提供支援。通话完毕。

Key.Original: This is Echo, town is secure. Rolling to staging area. Multiple contacts reported. ETA ... 2 mikes!
Key.Chinese: 這裡是Echo，小鎮已肅清。正前往等候區。已有多起衝突回報。預計抵達時間....2分鐘!
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是 Echo，小镇已肃清。正前往等候区。已有多起冲突回报。预计抵达时间....2分钟！

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: COMBINED ARMS - Close Air Support, Armored Vehicles, Anti-tank Weapons
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:聯合作戰-密接空中支援，武裝載具，反坦克武器
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示：合成作战—近距离空中支援，装甲车辆，反坦克武器

Key.Original: Assess the situation and retreat to Point Gamma if the enemy counterattack has overwhelmed your position
Key.Chinese: 隨時評估狀況，如果無法守住該位置，請撤退至伽馬點
Key.Chinesesimp: 随时评估形势，如果无法守住该位置，请撤退至伽马点

Key.Original: Friendly fire will not be tolerated!
Key.Chinese: 友軍傷害是不被允許的!
Key.Chinesesimp: 友军伤害是不被允许的！

Key.Original: You seized the compound yet were unable to hold and defend your position against the enemy counterattack. Regrouping with our forces at least gives you the chance to fight another day.
Key.Chinese: 你成功肅清了營地，但是無法從敵軍的反擊之中守住該地。從新集結我們的部隊，至少我們可以有機會擇日再戰。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功肃清了营地，但是无法从敌军的反击之中守住该地。重新集结我们的部队，至少我们可以有机会择日再战。

Key.Original: You successfully seized the compound and recovered from an overwhelming enemy counterattack to secure the LZ and prepare for the next operation.
Key.Chinese: 你成功肅清了營地，並在敵人的反擊之中肅清降落點，請等待下一項任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你成功肃清了营地，并在敌人的反击之中肃清降落点，请等待下一项任务。

Key.Chinese: 撤離直升機將在幾波後抵達
Key.Chinesesimp: 撤离直升机将在几波后抵达

Key.Original: Defend your camp against enemy attacks until the evacuation helicopter arrives.
Key.Chinese: 在敵人的攻擊之中守住你的基地，直到撤離直升機抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在敌人的攻击之中守住你的基地，直到撤离直升机抵达。

Key.Original: The last choppers have left the island leaving you stranded until further evacuation becomes possible.
Key.Chinese: 最後一架直升機已經離開了島嶼，你們必須自行防守，直到撤離直升機可以過來為止。
Key.Chinesesimp: 最后一架直升机已经离开了岛屿，你们必须自行防守，直到撤离直升机可以过来为止。

Key.Original: Make a stance against the imminent OPFOR attack and survive.
Key.Chinese: 鞏固陣地，在紅方的攻擊之中倖存。
Key.Chinesesimp: 巩固阵地，在红方的攻击之中幸存。

Key.Original:
1. Survive by defending Kamino
2. Call evacuation chopper when available
3. Leave Stratis
Key.Chinese:
1. 保護卡米諾，並倖存下來
2. 當支援可用時，呼叫撤離直升機
3. 離開斯特拉蒂斯島
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 保护卡米诺，并幸存下来
2. 当支援可用时，呼叫撤离直升机
3. 离开斯特拉蒂斯岛
